channel.title: Presentation on Celeste Basken

item.title: International Association of Landscape Ecology
item.description: I presented original research at the International Associate of Landscape Ecology, North America, conference in April 2021. My poster presentation was the culmination of a yearlong virtual internship with The Nature Conservancy, where I learned the programming language R and software GIS in order to create data visualizations of data about historic fire amounts in North America.
